subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: UConn’s Charde Houston, who can often be magnificent and maddening in the same game, finished with 10 points and 15 rebounds in the Huskies’ victory over Louisville Monday night.
snippet: UConn’s Charde Houston, who can often be magnificent and maddening in the same game, finished with 10 points and 15 rebounds in the Huskies’ victory over Louisville Monday night.
